physical and transition risk perspective.";{'text': ['The Group is analysing and monitoring its credit portfolio by using heat maps. ']

column1: In which cases does the Bank gather energy performing certificates (EPCs)? ;"For new lending the Bank gathers energy performance

energy performance certificate is mandatory according to

their properties
column2: do not need an EPC. For Back book the Bank

EPC-s. For modelled EPC-s in Slovenia external provider

and information from national building registry. Activities for
collecting additional official and modelled energy performance

certificates (EPC-s) in the whole Group are underway.";{'text': ['For new lending the Bank gathers energy performance
certificates (EPC-s) for real estate in collateral in all cases when
energy performance certificate is mandatory according to
Slovenian law.']
